front.title: MIP Extension for Ethernet Service transport Support

abstract.t: The IP Mobility Protocol [RFC3344] enables a mobile node maintain IPconnectivity when it changes its location. However, it is not enoughto enable the node to maintain L2 connectivity between mobile nodeand Ethernet service provider in order to support Ethernet servicetransport. This document describes "Ethernet Service Transport"mobility option for mobile IPv4 that is intended to assist home agenttunnel Ethernet packets from the home link to the FA on the foreignlink during the datagram delivery process.
